value: Write a function squaresofnumbers which takes a number as a parameter, and runs a loop from 1 to the given number, and makes the number and square of a number as key, value pair. See the example below.

title: solution
value:
function squares_of_numbers(limit){
var output={}
for(var i=1;i<=limit;i++){
output[i]=i*i
}
console.log(output);
}
squares_of_numbers(20)
